name: Snorlax
description: Very lazy. Just eats and sleeps. As its rotund bulk builds, it becomes steadily more slothful.

abilities.name: Immunity
abilities.effect: This Pokémon cannot be poisoned.  This includes bad poison.  If a Pokémon is poisoned and acquires this ability, its poison is healed; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.effect: This Pokémon takes half as much damage from fire- and ice-type moves.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.effect: This Pokémon eats any held Berry triggered by low HP when it falls below 50% of its HP, regardless of the Berry's usual threshold.
abilities.description: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.
